## How can I learn more about a certain topic? 

There are many ways to expand your knowledge on any given subject: find books, podcasts, documentaries, courses, attend events and lectures. The key is finding media that caters to your specific area of interest so that the experience becomes more rewarding and engaging. 

## What is empathy? 

Empathy is the ability to understand and share the feelings of another person. It involves being aware of how someone feels without necessarily agreeing with them or having to share the same emotions yourself. Being empathetic can involve listening actively, showing care & concern for the other person, showing appropriate facial expressions and providing appropriate words of comfort. 

## How can I develop empathy in myself? 

You can develop empathy in yourself by practicing compassion and kindness regularly. Ask yourself what kind things you can do for others this week as well as yourself.
